Question
========

A person achieves a score of 13.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.5 with a standard deviation 2.6. The z-score of the person with 13.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.31
* 2.19
* 2.66

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.31: Correct
* 2.19: Incorrect
* 2.66: Incorrect
